item.title: Shaun add a quote by Charles S. Brooks
item.description: "Consider me no fool because my tongue is mad. I salt a truth with jest that it sound not dull and heavy. There is more than jig and cadence in my words. I am of stronger fiber than you think. If there comes a time for proof I shall not fail." -- Charles S. Brooks

item.title: Shaun add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "No law can be sacred to me but that of my nature. Good and bad are but names very readily transferable to that or this; the only right is what is after my constitution; the only wrong is what is against it." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson
